New Records: Josh Hart became the first Knicks player since Michael Ray Richardson in 1981 with consecutive triple-doubles
Josh Hart has four triple-doubles this season and became the fourth player to have 10 triple-doubles with the Knicks
Key Match Events: New York had to change plans after Deuce McBride developed left hamstring tightness during warmups
Tyler Kolek played 12 minutes off the bench after logging 40 minutes earlier in the day, finishing with 36 points and 11 assists
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks had to replace Jalen Brunson with Cam Payne due to Brunson's right calf tightness
The team's strategy was to not be reliant on Brunson, which they demonstrated by shooting 55% from the field without him
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks have won 14 of their last 16 games
The Jazz lost their fifth straight game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks added Karl-Anthony Towns and Mikal Bridges in part to reduce their reliance on Brunson
The Knicks visit Oklahoma City on Friday, while the Jazz are at Miami on Saturday
Others: Lauri Markkanen shot just 6 for 22 en route to his 16 points for the Jazz
